description: Variation of Condition 1 of planning permission dated 29 June 2023 (22/05277/FULL) for part demolition of rooftop plant room and creation of a single storey roof extension at Brettenham House to provide B1 office floorspace; associated creation of terraces to the north and south part of the roofs; replacement and relocation of roof plant to basement level at Brettenham House; creation of a new office entrance to Savoy Street at basement level one of Brettenham House; refurbishment of ground floor shopfronts at Brettenham House on Lancaster Place facade; provision of cycle parking and associated facilities in the basement of Brettenham House; replacement of all the external windows and associated facade maintenance and cleaning and associated works at Brettenham House and 1 Lancaster Place namely, provision of a new lift, core and link access corridor at roof level and external alterations to the Savoy Street entrance, Lancaster Place and Victoria Embankment elevations.
